title: Co-op vs AI - Wat DoÂ¿
body:
First off, I want to say thank you to Riot for fixing the 5v4 "bug" that was affecting Intermediate Co-op vs AI for some time. For those who didn't know, only 4 of the 5 bots would spawn on the enemy team.

I understand why Bots aren't given a priority over the other parts of the game, but still there are people who _actually enjoy_ playing Co-op vs AI, for whatever reason/s. So thank you again for fixing that particular bug.

Of course, there are still a decent amount of minor bugs affecting Co-op vs AI, and while I have no expectation these will all be fixed _(because I understand there are more important priorities)_ I am genuinely curious about what plans Riot may have in the future regarding Co-op vs AI. I could write a wall worth of my opinions about how I think a small investment into Co-op vs AI could be beneficial to the League community (particularly new players), but that's probably best saved for another time.

So the main reason for this post, what prompted me to write this in the first place was because I had noticed for about 2 or 3 days this past week, Intermediate Bots were spawning on the bottom side of the map - and then randomly stopped. For those who don't know, in the past there was a small probability in Intermediate Co-op vs AI your team would start on the top side of the map (much like a normal game would) but for some time now, that hasn't been the case and your team would always start bottom. I've played about 25 Intermediate games since we randomly started spawning on the top side, so I'm confident we are back to always spawning bottom.

**So, wat do Riot¿**
